de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.flexiant.client.compute

Class FlexiantComputeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.flexiant.client.compute.FlexiantComputeClient

  • public class FlexiantComputeClient
extends Object
    Client for calling compute operations on flexiants extility api.

      • getServerByIp

        @Nullable
public Server getServerByIp(String ip,
                                      @Nullable
                                      String locationUUID)
                               throws FlexiantException
        Retrieves the server having the given ip.

        It seems that flexiant does not allow to query by ip. Therefore, this query loops through all servers, finding the ip.

        Parameters:
        ip - the ip of the server.
        locationUUID - optional location of the server, if null it will be ignored.
        Returns:
        the server having the given ip, or null if not found
        Throws:
        FlexiantException

      • getServerByIp

        @Nullable
public Server getServerByIp(String ip,
                                      String filter,
                                      @Nullable
                                      String locationUUID)
                               throws FlexiantException
        Retrieves the server having the ip and matching the given name filter.

        As we need to loop through all existing servers, the name filter can increase the speed.

        Parameters:
        ip - the ip of the server.
        filter - prefix to filter list of servers
        locationUUID - optional location of the server, if null it will be ignored.
        Returns:
        the server with having the given ip, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        FlexiantException

      • searchByIp

        @Nullable
protected Server searchByIp(Set<Server> servers,
                                      String ip)
        Searches for the given ip, in the given list of servers.
        Parameters:
        servers - list of servers to search in.
        ip - ip to search for.
        Returns:
        the server matching the ip or null

protected <T> T getSingleResource(SearchFilter sf,

                                            Class<T> type)
                                     throws FlexiantException

        type - the type of the resulting class.
        Returns:
        the resource or null if not found.
        Throws:

      • getResources

        protected <T> List<T> getResources(String prefix,
                                   String attribute,
                                   ResourceType resourceType,
                                   Class<T> type,
                                   @Nullable
                                   String locationUUID)
                            throws FlexiantException
        Retrieves a list of resources matching the given prefix on the given attribute which are of the given type.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix to match.
        attribute - the attribute where the prefix should match.
        resourceType - the type of the resource.
        type - the type of the resulting class.
        locationUUID - optional location of the type, if null it will be ignored.
        Returns:
        a list containing all resources matching the request.
        Throws:
        FlexiantException - if an error occurs while contacting the api.
